sprouts

Interface Noticeable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Event

    public interface Noticeable
    This represents an occurrence that can be observed but not triggered. It is used to register listeners so that they can be notified. Contrary to events received by property observers, observing a Noticeable does not involve any state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Noticeable subscribe(Listener listener)
      Subscribes the given listener to this Noticeable.
      Noticeable unsubscribe(Listener listener)
      Unsubscribes the given listener from this Noticeable.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        Noticeable subscribe(Listener listener)
        Subscribes the given listener to this Noticeable.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to subscribe.
        Returns:
        this Noticeable for chaining.

      • unsubscribe

        Noticeable unsubscribe(Listener listener)
        Unsubscribes the given listener from this Noticeable.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to unsubscribe.
        Returns:
        this Noticeable for chaining.
